'''Shuyun''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[The Cat's Tail]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Location==
<gallery>
The Cat's Tail Location.png|Shuyun's location
NPC Location Prince, Shuyun Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
When [[Genius Invokation TCG]] became popular outside of [[Inazuma]], Shuyun traveled from [[Liyue]]<ref>[[Map]], Description: [[Prince]]</ref> to [[The Cat's Tail]] and met [[Prince]]. He assists Prince and the other cat players in playing their decks when the [[Traveler]] challenges them to a duel. He is able to understand what cats say and translates their words to others.
